workflow.name: Personalized lead response with AI videos using Scout, GPT-4, and HeyGen
workflow.description:
üé• AI-Powered Inbound Video Agent: Auto-Respond to Leads with Personalized Videos
Description: This workflow automates the first-touch response for inbound leads by creating and delivering a hyper-personalized video and follow-up email, all in seconds, using a powerful stack: n8n, Scout, HeyGen API, and OpenAI.

How It Works (The Lead Journey):

üì• Form Trigger: Captures initial user inputs (name, email, address).

üîé Data Enrichment (Scout): Instantly looks up lead details like property type, homeownership status, and household income.

‚úçÔ∏è Script Agent (GPT-5/LangChain): An AI agent writes a professional, 15-second outreach script, tailoring the message with three discussion paths based on the enriched Scout data.

üé¨ Video Generation (HeyGen): Triggers an avatar video using the custom script.

üìß Delivery Logic: Waits for the video to complete, retrieves the final URL/thumbnail, and passes it to the next step.

üîó Email Writer (GPT-4): Generates an HTML outreach email, embedding the video thumbnail and including a direct booking link (Calendly).

üöÄ Send Email (Gmail Node): Sends the complete, personalized message to the inbound lead automatically.

Key Integrations:

Scout: Lead Data Enrichment

HeyGen: AI Avatar Video Generation

OpenAI (GPT-4/LangChain): Scriptwriting and Email Copy

Gmail: Automated Email Delivery

Setup Note: Ensure you have configured n8n credentials for HeyGen (httpHeaderAuth), Scout (HTTP Request header), OpenAI, and Gmail (OAuth2).

workflow.name: Scout + HeyGen for Video Lead Generation

parameters.formDescription: Fill Out This Form to Get More Info on Scout

options.systemMessage:
=You are an expert video script agent generating short, professional selfie-style scripts for the Heygen API.

**Task:** Write a first-touch outreach script for Sam, a real estate agent who works with Maria at Best Real Estate. The script must sound credible, approachable, and tailored. Every script must illustrate three potential discussion paths, so the lead sees themselves in the examples and understands why connecting is valuable.

**Dynamic Data (may or may not be present):**
- Name: {{ $json.matched_first_name }}
- Location: {{ $json.city }}, {{ $json.state }}
- Property: {{ $json.prop_type }}, {{ $json.year_built }}, {{ $json.square_feet }}
- Ownership: {{ $json.homeownercd }}, {{ $json.lor }}
- Financials: {{ $json.hhi }}, {{ $json.wealth }}
- Other: {{ $json.language }}, {{ $json.occupation }}, {{ $json.children }}

**Core Principles:**
1. **Greeting:** Always start with the lead‚Äôs first name if available. Example: "Hey {{ $json.matched_first_name }}, this is Sam..."
2. **Language:** Deliver the full script in {{ $json.language }} if provided, otherwise default to English.
3. **Personalization:** Use ownership type, property type, and city context to frame the first two client scenarios. Never present the data as an absolute fact about the lead‚Äîframe it as a common situation or client story.
   - ‚ùå "You‚Äôre renting a condo in San Francisco."  
   - ‚úÖ "Many renters in San Francisco‚Äôs condo market are exploring ownership..."
4. **Social Proof via Three Discussion Paths:**  
   Every script should mention **three reasons clients like this lead connect with us**:  
   - (1) A likely driver inferred from data (ownership status, property type, city).  
   - (2) A second common driver phrased as a different client use case or story.  
   - (3) An open door for the lead‚Äôs own goals.  
5. **Reasons to Connect:** Explicitly show that clients benefit by gaining clarity, finding opportunities, and avoiding mistakes.  
6. **Length:** Keep the script under 15 seconds (~55‚Äì70 words).  
7. **Structure:**  
   - Greeting & intro  
   - Three client paths (driver #1, driver #2, other goals)  
   - Call-to-Action: "I‚Äôve included a link below to my calendar‚Äîlet‚Äôs book a quick 15 minutes this week."

**Output:** ONLY the complete script in the target language. Do not include explanations, reasoning, or metadata.

values.content:
You're an email agent for Sam at Best Real Estate. Your job is to craft an impactful email based on the information you've received from a form submission, and to pass along a short intro video along with the email. The goal of the email is to ask the prospect to book a time with you on https://calendly.com/best-real-estate.

You will also receive the video link and thumbnail to embed in the user input, please embed the video link on to the thumbnail instead of showing the entire long URL.

Output in HTML so that the thumbnail and video format is correct - only output the body of the email to the next node, as the next node is the gmail node.

parameters.content:
üé• AI-Powered Inbound Video Agent ‚Äì Auto-Respond to Leads with Personalized Videos

Description:
This workflow helps you instantly respond to inbound leads with a hyper-personalized video and email‚Äîfully automated using n8n, Scout, Heygen API, and OpenAI.

üì• How It Works:

Form Trigger
‚ÄÉCaptures user inputs like name, email, address, and additional data points from Scout.

AI Video Prompt Agent

‚ÄÉUses LangChain + OpenAI to write a short, personalized script (e.g., ‚ÄúHey this is Jason from Top Real Estate...‚Äù).

Retrieve Data
‚ÄÉGets data from Scout to personalize your outreach.

Video Generation (Heygen API)
‚ÄÉTriggers a video using a selected avatar and voice style.

Video Status & Wait Logic
‚ÄÉMonitors the video generation status until completed.

Get Final Video URL & Thumbnail
‚ÄÉRetrieves the finished video and prepares for embedding.

Email Writer (GPT-4)
‚ÄÉGenerates an HTML-based outreach email including the lead's info and embedded video thumbnail with a booking link.

Email Delivery (Gmail Node)
‚ÄÉSends the full message to the inbound lead automatically.

‚öôÔ∏è Tools & Integrations:
n8n (self-hosted or cloud)

Heygen API ‚Äì for video generation

LangChain + OpenAI GPT-4 ‚Äì for script writing and email creation

Gmail Node ‚Äì for automated outreach delivery

üîß Setup Instructions:
Heygen API Key
‚ÄÉCreate a Heygen account and retrieve your API key. Set it up as a credential in n8n (httpHeaderAuth).

Scout API Key
‚ÄÉAdd your Scout API key in your Scout account at app.trustscout.com.

OpenAI Key
‚ÄÉAdd your OpenAI API key under OpenAI credentials.

Gmail OAuth2
‚ÄÉConnect your Gmail account using OAuth2 for sending emails.

Customize the Prompt
‚ÄÉModify the system message in the LangChain Agent node to reflect your brand tone or CTA.

Calendly Link
‚ÄÉUpdate the call-to-action links in both the video prompt and email generator nodes with your real booking URL.

üí° Use Cases:
Automating welcome sequences for new signups

Personalized video lead responses for agencies and outreach

parameters.name: X-Api-Key
parameters.value: ADD YOUR SCOUT API KEY HERE

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
